TopicTitle: Nox, a old rpg, now free on Origin

Articles.Content:
If you like older rpg games, get the free game now on Origin.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nox_(video_game)
https://www.origin.com/en-ie/store/free-games/on-the-house
Is it now? A friend of mine owns it on disc. So if he loses it I have an alternative source. Granted it might not work with W10.
For a limited time only. I think the free game change every few months.
